PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-06732020-09-20,  ,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (COVID-19 — Wage Subsidy for Furloughed Employees)
PrecisRegulations amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (COVID-19 — Wage Subsidy for Furloughed Employees) in order to extend the Canada Emergency Wage Subsidy (CEWS) treatment for furloughed employees to September 26, 2020.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0207 Publication Date: 2020-10-14
